projects.name: Frontend Deployment
projects.description: Design deployment strategy for react applications
details: Build webpack plugin to exclude whitelisted dependencies from bundle, leading to a 50% reduction in static content size
Build loader that includes bundle and shared dependencies on webpage

projects.name: Virence Migration
details: Introduced several teams of AngularJS developers to React
Architected solutions to maintain compatability with existing backend

projects.name: Nursing Flowsheets
projects.description: Build workflow for nurses to document patient assessments
details: Spearheaded the development of the company's first React application
Reduced load and render time of data grid by upwards of 90% through virtualization and an upgraded API
Lowered user documentation time by ~60% by condensing workflows

projects.name: Forge Design System
projects.description: Build React component library for our internal design system
details: Implemented generalized table and selection list components
Pioneered process for decentralized teams to contribute to the library

projects.name: Messaging Operations
projects.description: Maintained message queuing system for contacting patients
details: Integrated a new messaging service provider to decrease cost per message from $0.10 to $0.03, saving ~$4 million per year
After enhancing monitoring with Grafana, identified bottlenecks and increased message completion rate from 99.3% to 99.97%

projects.name: IdeaLab
projects.description: Modeled customer life cycles to recognize valuable clients
details: Segmented the customer base through statistical analysis and machine learning using R

projects.name: VTeam
projects.description: Designed and implemented a .NET application to view project dependencies using C#
details: Computed module integration complexity using design predicates and reflection
